entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with a few flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
